articles.author: Becca Caddy
articles.title: LG OLED TVs in 2024: everything we know so far and what we want to see - TechRadar
articles.description: What's next for LG's flagship OLED TVs?
articles.content: 2023 was a good year for LG's OLED TVs, but it wasn't great. In our best OLED TVs guide, the LG A2, LG B3 and LG C3 all rank highly. But an LG TV isn't sat at the top spot. Instead, that title goes t… [+10775 chars]
